thread.title: A look at each potential World Series matchup

title: A look at each potential World Series matchup
text:
> Sports A look at each potential World Series matchup Ernie Banks' statue wears a Chicago Cubs jersey at Wrigley Field on Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs will face the St. Louis Cardinals in Game 1 of the National League Division Series on Friday. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
